title: Assassin's Creed Origins
notes: Requires Ubisoft Connect launcher. Requires Ubisoft Connect setup. Native controller support. **Decky Plugin: Some tinkering required**. **2.0 Standalone: Some tinkering required**.
description: Set in Ancient Egypt, players will journey to the most mysterious place in history, during a crucial period that will shape the world and give rise to the Assassin's Brotherhood.
